definitions: a playing card that can have any value, suit, color, or other property in a game at the discretion of the player holding it.
shortDefinitions: playing card that can have any value, suit, color, or other property in game at discretion of player

definitions: a person or thing whose influence is unpredictable or whose qualities are uncertain.
shortDefinitions: person or thing whose influence is unpredictable or whose qualities are uncertain

definitions: a character that will match any character or sequence of characters in a search.
shortDefinitions: character that will match any character or sequence of characters in search

definitions: an opportunity to enter a sports competition without having to take part in qualifying matches or be ranked at a particular level.
shortDefinitions: opportunity to enter sports competition without having to take part in qualifying matches or be ranked at particular level

definitions: a player or team granted a wild card.
shortDefinitions: player or team given such opportunity
